name: The Mansion: Definitive Edition
description:
"Ô, Wandering soul!

join us fae, in this dance macabre

join us in between these walls,

for you have wandered where man should not,

in the darkness of this house. Face your fears!

Or let yourself forever weep in This Mansion

of horrors, of traps, of things defiled!

This Mansion of Madness!"

The Mansion : Definitive edition is a remake of  The Mansion.

Play as a Little Ted, an incredibly agile and courageous kid for his age, and enter The Mansion to unravel its secrets. 

In this spooky platformer, explore many rooms and find the keys to help you

escape. But Watch out! Creepy ghosts and hideous monsters are on your tracks! 

Can you trust the vanishing floors of this mansion ?

Good luck.
